Basic read flow:

- Get sync/v3/root
- Get the listing from its hash

### Get root

GET https://internal.cloud.remarkable.com/sync/v3/root

Returns

```
GET https://internal.cloud.remarkable.com/sync/v3/root

{"hash":"98ea6e4f216f2fb4b69fff9b3a44842c38686ca685f3f55dc48c5d3fb1107be4","generation":1726948225904253,"schemaVersion":3}
```


### Get root listing

GET https://internal.cloud.remarkable.com/sync/v3/files/98ea6e4f216f2fb4b69fff9b3a44842c38686ca685f3f55dc48c5d3fb1107be4

Returns

list_entry contains:
hash:blobType:id:fileCount:size

### Get file listing

A file has multiple parts.


```
GET https://internal.cloud.remarkable.com/sync/v3/files/7693113cec615bf779ad1081c9b9efd4bc847045b6218272664dd254946db6af

3

```


### Put a file

```
PUT https://internal.cloud.remarkable.com/sync/v3/files/7693113cec615bf779ad1081c9b9efd4bc847045b6218272664dd254946db6af
Content-Length: 1043
Rm-Filename: 85281341-2e17-46fe-b394-fc8cffed9401.content
X-Goog-Hash: crc32c=kziBcg==

...JSON...
```

### Put new root reference

```
PUT https://internal.cloud.remarkable.com/sync/v3/root
Rm-Filename: roothash
Content-Length: ...
X-Goog-Hash: ...

{"hash":"98ea6e4f216f2fb4b69fff9b3a44842c38686ca685f3f55dc48c5d3fb1107be4","generation":1726948225904253,"schemaVersion":3}
```
